blocks.name: diff.csconn.s

df-pconn
blocks.content: Define the class of path-connected topologies. A topology is path-connected if there is a path (a continuous function from the closed unit interval) that goes from ` x ` to ` y ` for any points ` x , y ` in the space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-pconn(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cpconn, crab(s0, ctop, wral(s1, cuni(cv(s0)), wral(s2, cuni(cv(s0)), wrex(s3, co(cii, ccn, cv(s0)), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s3), nat0), cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(cv(s3), nat1), cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: df-sconn
blocks.content: Define the class of simply connected topologies. A topology is simply connected if it is path-connected and every loop (continuous path with identical start and endpoint) is contractible to a point (path-homotopic to a constant function). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)

blocks.name: ispconn
blocks.content: The property of being a path-connected topological space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ispconn(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cpconn), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, co(cii, ccn, c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat0), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat1), cv(s1))))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, cpconn), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, co(cii, ccn, c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat0), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat1), cv(s1)))))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, cpconn), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, co(cii, ccn, c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat0), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat1), cv(s1)))))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cpconn, ctop, wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, co(cii, ccn, c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat0), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat1), cv(s1)))))), wral(s0, cuni(cv(hs0)), wral(s1, cuni(cv(hs0)), wrex(s2, co(cii, ccn, cv(hs0)), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat0), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat1), cv(s1)))))))
  raleqbidv(s0, cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s1, cuni(cv(hs0)), wrex(s2, co(cii, ccn, cv(hs0)), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat0), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat1), cv(s1))))), wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, co(cii, ccn, c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat0), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat1), cv(s1))))))
  raleqbidv(s1, cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s2, co(cii, ccn, cv(hs0)), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat0), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat1), cv(s1)))), wrex(s2, co(cii, ccn, c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat0), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat1), cv(s1)))))
  syl6eqr(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  rexeqdv(s2, co(cii, ccn, cv(hs0)), co(cii, ccn, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat0), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat1), cv(s1))))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cii, ccn)
  df-pconn(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, co(cii, ccn, c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat0), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), nat1), cv(s1)))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.co.s(s2, cii, ccn, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.co.s(s2, cii, ccn, c0)
  diff.cii.s(s2)
  diff.ccn.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ispconn(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ PConn ↔(c0 ∈ Top ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2 ∈(II[Cn]c0),((s2 ` 0)= s0 ∧(s2 ` 1)= s1))))))
  ⊣ c1 = ⋃ c0
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ PConn ↔(c0 ∈ Top ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2 ∈(II[Cn]c0),((s2 ` 0)= s0 ∧(s2 ` 1)= s1)))))), d(s0, c1))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ PConn ↔(c0 ∈ Top ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2 ∈(II[Cn]c0),((s2 ` 0)= s0 ∧(s2 ` 1)= s1)))))), d(s1, c1))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cpconn, ctop, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2 ∈(II[Cn]c0),((s2 ` 0)= s0 ∧(s2 ` 1)= s1)))), ∀(s0 ∈ ⋃ hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ ⋃ hs0, ∃(s2 ∈(II[Cn]hs0),((s2 ` 0)= s0 ∧(s2 ` 1)= s1)))))
  raleqbidv(s0, ⋃ hs0, c1, hs0 = c0, ∀(s1 ∈ ⋃ hs0, ∃(s2 ∈(II[Cn]hs0),((s2 ` 0)= s0 ∧(s2 ` 1)= s1))), ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2 ∈(II[Cn]c0),((s2 ` 0)= s0 ∧(s2 ` 1)= s1))))
  raleqbidv(s1, ⋃ hs0, c1, hs0 = c0, ∃(s2 ∈(II[Cn]hs0),((s2 ` 0)= s0 ∧(s2 ` 1)= s1)), ∃(s2 ∈(II[Cn]c0),((s2 ` 0)= s0 ∧(s2 ` 1)= s1)))
  syl6eqr(⋃ hs0, c1, ⋃ c0, hs0 = c0)
  unieq(hs0, c0)
  rexeqdv(s2, (II[Cn]hs0), (II[Cn]c0), hs0 = c0, ((s2 ` 0)= s0 ∧(s2 ` 1)= s1))
  oveq2(hs0, c0, cii, ccn)
  df-pconn(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2 ∈(II[Cn]c0),((s2 ` 0)= s0 ∧(s2 ` 1)= s1)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.co.s(s2, cii, ccn, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.co.s(s2, cii, ccn, c0)
  diff.cii.s(s2)
  diff.ccn.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: pconncn
blocks.content: The property of being a path-connected topological space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm pconncn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cpconn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wrex(s0, co(cii, ccn, c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat1), c3))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  3impib(wcel(c0, cpconn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wrex(s0, co(cii, ccn, c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat1), c3))))
  syl5com(wcel(c0, cpconn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wrex(s0, co(cii, ccn, c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat1), c3))), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wrex(s0, co(cii, ccn, c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat1), cv(hs1)))))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, cpconn), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wrex(s0, co(cii, ccn, c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat1), cv(hs1)))))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  ispconn(hs0, hs1, s0, c0, c2)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, c3, c2, wrex(s0, co(cii, ccn, c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat1), cv(hs1)))), wrex(s0, co(cii, ccn, c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat1), c3))), wrex(s0, co(cii, ccn, c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat1), cv(hs1)))))
  rexbidv(s0, co(cii, ccn, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat1), cv(hs1))), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat1), cv(hs1))))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat1), cv(hs1)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c1))
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), c1, cfv(cv(s0), nat0))
  rexbidv(s0, co(cii, ccn, c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat1), cv(hs1))), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat1), c3)))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat1), cv(hs1)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat1), c3))
  eqeq2(cv(hs1), c3, cfv(cv(s0), nat1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, co(cii, ccn, c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat1), cv(hs1)))))
  diff.hs1.w(wrex(s0, co(cii, ccn, c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), c1), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat1), c3))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pconncn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ PConn ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→ ∃(s0 ∈(II[Cn]c0),((s0 ` 0)= c1 ∧(s0 ` 1)= c3)))
  ⊣ c2 = ⋃ c0
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  3impib(c0 ∈ PConn, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, ∃(s0 ∈(II[Cn]c0),((s0 ` 0)= c1 ∧(s0 ` 1)= c3)))
  syl5com(c0 ∈ PConn, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), ∃(s0 ∈(II[Cn]c0),((s0 ` 0)= c1 ∧(s0 ` 1)= c3)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2, ∃(s0 ∈(II[Cn]c0),((s0 ` 0)= hs0 ∧(s0 ` 1)= hs1)))))
  simprbi(c0 ∈ PConn, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2, ∃(s0 ∈(II[Cn]c0),((s0 ` 0)= hs0 ∧(s0 ` 1)= hs1)))), c0 ∈ Top)
  ispconn(hs0, hs1, s0, c0, c2)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, c3, c2, ∃(s0 ∈(II[Cn]c0),((s0 ` 0)= hs0 ∧(s0 ` 1)= hs1)), ∃(s0 ∈(II[Cn]c0),((s0 ` 0)= c1 ∧(s0 ` 1)= c3)), ∃(s0 ∈(II[Cn]c0),((s0 ` 0)= c1 ∧(s0 ` 1)= hs1)))
  rexbidv(s0, (II[Cn]c0), hs0 = c1, ((s0 ` 0)= hs0 ∧(s0 ` 1)= hs1), ((s0 ` 0)= c1 ∧(s0 ` 1)= hs1))
  anbi1d(hs0 = c1, (s0 ` 0)= hs0, (s0 ` 1)= hs1, (s0 ` 0)= c1)
  eqeq2(hs0, c1, (s0 ` 0))
  rexbidv(s0, (II[Cn]c0), hs1 = c3, ((s0 ` 0)= c1 ∧(s0 ` 1)= hs1), ((s0 ` 0)= c1 ∧(s0 ` 1)= c3))
  anbi2d(hs1 = c3, (s0 ` 0)= c1, (s0 ` 1)= hs1, (s0 ` 1)= c3)
  eqeq2(hs1, c3, (s0 ` 1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0 ∈(II[Cn]c0),((s0 ` 0)= c1 ∧(s0 ` 1)= hs1)))
  diff.hs1.w(∃(s0 ∈(II[Cn]c0),((s0 ` 0)= c1 ∧(s0 ` 1)= c3)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: pconntop
blocks.content: A simply connected space is a topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm pconntop(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cpconn), wcel(c0, ctop))
} = {
  simplbi(wcel(c0, cpconn), wcel(c0, ctop), wral(hs1, cuni(c0), wral(hs2, cuni(c0), wrex(hs0, co(cii, ccn, c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), nat0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), nat1), cv(hs2)))))))
  ispconn(hs1, hs2, hs0, c0, cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pconntop(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ PConn → c0 ∈ Top)
} = {
  simplbi(c0 ∈ PConn, c0 ∈ Top, ∀(hs1 ∈ ⋃ c0, ∀(hs2 ∈ ⋃ c0, ∃(hs0 ∈(II[Cn]c0),((hs0 ` 0)= hs1 ∧(hs0 ` 1)= hs2)))))
  ispconn(hs1, hs2, hs0, c0, ⋃ c0)
  eqid(⋃ c0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(⋃ c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(⋃ c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: issconn
blocks.content: The property of being a simply connected topological space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm issconn(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, csconn), wa(wcel(c0, cpconn), wral(s0, co(cii, ccn, c0), wi(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), cfv(cv(s0), nat1)), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cphtpc, c0), cxp(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), csn(cfv(cv(s0), nat0))))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, csconn, cpconn, wral(s0, co(cii, ccn, c0), wi(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), cfv(cv(s0), nat1)), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cphtpc, c0), cxp(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), csn(cfv(cv(s0), nat0)))))), wral(s0, co(cii, ccn, cv(hs0)), wi(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), cfv(cv(s0), nat1)), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cphtpc, cv(hs0)), cxp(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), csn(cfv(cv(s0), nat0)))))))
  raleqbidv(s0, co(cii, ccn, cv(hs0)), co(cii, ccn, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), cfv(cv(s0), nat1)), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cphtpc, cv(hs0)), cxp(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), csn(cfv(cv(s0), nat0))))), wi(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), cfv(cv(s0), nat1)), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cphtpc, c0), cxp(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), csn(cfv(cv(s0), nat0))))))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cii, ccn)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), cfv(cv(s0), nat1)), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cphtpc, cv(hs0)), cxp(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), csn(cfv(cv(s0), nat0)))), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cphtpc, c0), cxp(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), csn(cfv(cv(s0), nat0)))))
  breqd(cv(s0), cfv(cphtpc, cv(hs0)), cxp(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), csn(cfv(cv(s0), nat0))), cfv(cphtpc, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cphtpc)
  df-sconn(hs0, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cpconn)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, co(cii, ccn, c0), wi(wceq(cfv(cv(s0), nat0), cfv(cv(s0), nat1)), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(cphtpc, c0), cxp(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), csn(cfv(cv(s0), nat0)))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: sconnpht
blocks.content: A closed path in a simply connected space is contractible to a point. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm sconnpht(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, csconn), wcel(c1, co(cii, ccn, c0)), wceq(cfv(c1, nat0), cfv(c1, nat1))), wbr(c1, cfv(cphtpc, c0), cxp(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), csn(cfv(c1, nat0)))))

blocks.name: cnpconn
blocks.content: An image of a path-connected space is path-connected. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: txpconn
blocks.content: The topological product of two path-connected spaces is path-connected. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Feb-2015.)

blocks.name: ptpconn
blocks.content: The topological product of a collection of path-connected spaces is path-connected. The proof uses the axiom of choice. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: qtoppconn
blocks.content: A quotient of a path-connected space is path-connected. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: pconnpi1
blocks.content: All fundamental groups in a path-connected space are isomorphic. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Feb-2015.)

blocks.name: sconnpht2
blocks.content: Any two paths in a simply connected space with the same start and end point are path-homotopic. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm sconnpht2(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, csconn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(cii, ccn, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(cii, ccn, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, nat0), cfv(c2, nat0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, nat1), cfv(c2, nat1)))
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(cphtpc, c1), c2), wbr(co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))))), cfv(cphtpc, c1), cxp(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), csn(cfv(c0, nat0)))))

  syl3anc(w0, wbr(co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))))), cfv(cphtpc, c1), cxp(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), csn(cfv(co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))))), nat0)))), wcel(c1, csconn), wcel(co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))))), co(cii, ccn, c1)), wceq(cfv(co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))))), nat0), cfv(co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))))), nat1)))
  pcocn(c0, c1, cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)))), w0)
  eqtr4d(cfv(c0, nat1), cfv(cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)))), nat0), cfv(c2, nat1), w0)
  simp2d(w0, wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)))), nat0), cfv(c2, nat1)), wcel(cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)))), co(cii, ccn, c1)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)))), nat1), cfv(c2, nat0)))
  eqtr4d(cfv(co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))))), nat0), cfv(co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))))), nat1), cfv(c0, nat0), w0)
  eqtr4d(cfv(co(c0, cfv(cpco, c1), cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))))), nat1), cfv(c0, nat0), cfv(cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)))), nat1), w0)
  pco1(c0, c1, cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)))), w0)
  eqtr4d(cfv(c0, nat0), cfv(cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)))), nat1), cfv(c2, nat0), w0)

  syl(w0, w3a(wcel(cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)))), co(cii, ccn, c1)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)))), nat0), cfv(c2, nat1)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c2, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)))), nat1), cfv(c2, nat0))), wcel(c2, co(cii, ccn, c1)))

blocks.name: sconnpi1
blocks.content: A path-connected topological space is simply connected iff its fundamental group is trivial. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm sconnpi1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cpconn), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c0, csconn), wbr(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cpi1, c1)), cen, c1o)))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
} = {
  impbida(wa(wcel(c0, cpconn), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, csconn), wbr(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cpi1, c1)), cen, c1o))
  adantll(wcel(c0, cpconn), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, csconn), wbr(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cpi1, c1)), cen, c1o))
  syl6eqbr(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cpi1, c1)), cen, c1o, csn(cfv(c0g, co(c0, cpi1, c1))), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, csconn)))
  eqssd(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cpi1, c1)), csn(cfv(c0g, co(c0, cpi1, c1))), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, csconn)))
  ssrdv(hs0, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cpi1, c1)), csn(cfv(c0g, co(c0, cpi1, c1))), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, csconn)))
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, csconn)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cpi1, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cfv(c0g, co(c0, cpi1, c1)))), wrex(hs1, co(cii, ccn, c0), wa(wa(wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat0), c1), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cec(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpc, c0))))))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, csconn)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cpi1, c1))), wrex(hs1, co(cii, ccn, c0), wa(wa(wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat0), c1), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cec(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpc, c0)))))), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2))
  elpi1(hs1, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cpi1, c1)), c0, c1, co(c0, cpi1, c1), c2, wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2)))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wcel(c0, ctop))
  simpl(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpr(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, c2))
  rexlimdva(hs1, co(cii, ccn, c0), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, csconn)), wa(wa(wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat0), c1), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cec(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpc, c0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cfv(c0g, co(c0, cpi1, c1)))))
  expimpd(wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, csconn)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(cii, ccn, c0))), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat0), c1), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cec(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpc, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cfv(c0g, co(c0, cpi1, c1)))))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, csconn)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(cii, ccn, c0))), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat0), c1), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat1), c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cec(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpc, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cfv(c0g, co(c0, cpi1, c1)))), wceq(cec(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpc, c0)), cfv(c0g, co(c0, cpi1, c1))))
  eqtrd(cec(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpc, c0)), cfv(c0g, co(c0, cpi1, c1)), cec(cxp(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), csn(c1)), cfv(cphtpc, c0)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, csconn)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(cii, ccn, c0))), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat0), c1), wceq(cfv(cv(hs1), nat1), c1))))

blocks.name: txsconn
blocks.content: The topological product of two simply connected spaces is simply connected. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm txsconn(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, csconn), wcel(c1, csconn)), wcel(co(c0, ctx, c1), csconn))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, csconn), wcel(c1, csconn)), wcel(co(c0, ctx, c1), csconn), wcel(co(c0, ctx, c1), cpconn), wral(hs0, co(cii, ccn, co(c0, ctx, c1)), wi(wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), nat0), cfv(cv(hs0), nat1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cphtpc, co(c0, ctx, c1)), cxp(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), csn(cfv(cv(hs0), nat0)))))))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, csconn), wcel(c1, csconn), wcel(co(c0, ctx, c1), cpconn), wcel(c0, cpconn), wcel(c1, cpconn))
  sconnpconn(c0)
  sconnpconn(c1)

blocks.name: cvxpconn
blocks.content: A convex subset of the complex numbers is path-connected. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))

  frnd(cmpt(s2, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, co(co(nat1, cmin, cv(s2)), cmul, cv(s1)))), c1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))

blocks.name: cvxsconn
blocks.content: A convex subset of the complex numbers is simply connected. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Feb-2015.)

blocks.name: blsconn
blocks.content: An open ball in the complex numbers is simply connected. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm blsconn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(c2, csconn))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c0, cfv(cbl, ccom(cabs, cmin)), c1))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c3, crest, c4))
} = {
  cvxsconn(hs0, hs1, hs2, c2, c4, c3, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cxr)))
  syl5eqss(c4, cc, co(c0, cfv(cbl, ccom(cabs, cmin)), c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cxr)))
  mp3an1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cxr), wss(co(c0, cfv(cbl, ccom(cabs, cmin)), c1), cc), wcel(ccom(cabs, cmin), cfv(cxmet, cc)))
  cnxmet()
  blssm(ccom(cabs, cmin), cc, c0, c1)
  blcvx(c0, c1, cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cxr)))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cxr)))
  diff.hs2.w(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cxr)))
}

blocks.name: resconn
blocks.content: A subset of ` RR ` is simply connected iff it is connected. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Mar-2015.)
